sentence.Network_en: This paper introduced how to make a fast - drying emulsion adhesive based on polyvinyl formaldehyde.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了一种以改性的聚乙烯醇缩甲醛为基料的强力快干型抗冻乳白胶.

sentence.Network_en: The material is readily prepared by reaction of formaldehyde and hydrazine.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种物质很容易由甲醛和肼反应而得到.
甲醛能慢慢使多种病毒失去活性.

auth_sentence.content: Well, at least it isn't in formaldehyde.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well, at least it isn't in formaldehyde.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well, at least it isn't in formaldehyde.

auth_sentence.content: Formaldehyde can be contaminated with bacteria, for example.
auth_sentence.res_content: Formaldehyde can be contaminated with bacteria, for example.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Formaldehyde can be contaminated with bacteria, for example.

auth_sentence.content: Formaldehyde also is a skin, eye and respiratory irritant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Formaldehyde also is a skin, eye and respiratory irritant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Formaldehyde also is a skin, eye and respiratory irritant.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
